00014 #include "pulserdriver.h"
00015 #include "chardevicedriver.h"
00016 #include <vector>
00017 
00018 //! My pulser driver
00019 class XSHPulser : public XCharDeviceDriver<XPulser>
00020 {
00021     XNODE_OBJECT
00022 protected:
00023     XSHPulser(const char *name, bool runtime,
00024               const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00025               const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00026               const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00027               const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00028 public:
00029     virtual ~XSHPulser() {}
00030 
00031 protected:
00032     //! send patterns to pulser or turn-off
00033     virtual void changeOutput(bool output, unsigned int blankpattern);
00034     //! convert RelPatList to native patterns
00035     virtual void createNativePatterns();
00036     //! time resolution [ms]
00037     virtual double resolution() const;
00038     virtual double resolutionQAM() const {return resolution();}
00039     //! minimum period of pulses [ms]
00040     virtual double minPulseWidth() const {return resolution();}
00041     //! existense of AO ports.
00042     virtual bool haveQAMPorts() const {return true;}
00043 
00044 private:
00045     int setAUX2DA(double volt, int addr);
00046     int insertPreamble(uint16_t startpattern);
00047     int finishPulse();
00048     //! Add 1 pulse pattern
00049     //! \param term a period to next pattern
00050     //! \param pattern a pattern for digital, to appear
00051     int pulseAdd(uint64_t term, uint32_t pattern, bool firsttime, bool dryrun);
00052     uint32_t m_lastPattern;
00053     uint64_t m_dmaTerm;  
00054   
00055     std::vector<unsigned char> m_zippedPatterns;
00056   
00057     int m_waveformPos[PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK/PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX];
00058 
00059     //dma time commands
00060     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_END;
00061     //+1: a phase by 90deg.
00062     //+2,3: from DMA start
00063     //+4,5: src neg. offset from here
00064     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_COPY_HBURST;
00065     //+1,2: time to appear
00066     //+2,3: pattern to appear
00067     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_LONG;
00068     //+0: time to appear + START
00069     //+1,2: pattern to appear
00070     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_START;
00071     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_END;
00072 
00073     //off-dma time commands
00074     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_END;
00075     //+1,2 : TimerL
00076     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT;
00077     //+1,2 : TimerL
00078     //+3,4: LSW of TimerU
00079     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG;
00080     //+1,2 : TimerL
00081     //+3,4: MSW of TimerU
00082     //+5,6: LSW of TimerU
00083     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG_LONG;
00084     //+1: byte
00085     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX1;
00086     //+1: byte
00087     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX3;
00088     //+1: address
00089     //+2,3: value
00090     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX2_DA;
00091     //+1,2: loops
00092     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DO;
00093     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_LOOP;
00094     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_LOOP_INF;
00095     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_BREAKPOINT;
00096     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_PULSEON;
00097     //+1,2: last pattern
00098     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_SET;
00099     //+1,2: size
00100     //+2n: patterns
00101     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_HBURST;
00102     //+1 (signed char): QAM1 offset
00103     //+2 (signed char): QAM2 offset
00104     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_OFFSET;
00105     //+1 (signed char): QAM1 level
00106     //+2 (signed char): QAM2 level
00107     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_LEVEL;
00108     //+1 (signed char): QAM1 delay
00109     //+2 (signed char): QAM2 delay
00110     static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_DELAY;
00111 };
